# annotationTitles(_:)

**Instance Method**

Sets the visibility of titles for markers and annotations.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency func annotationTitles(_ visibility: Visibility) -> some MapContent

```

## Parameters

- **visibility**: One of the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/SwiftUI/Visibility] settings. The default is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/SwiftUI/Visibility/automatic] visibility, that results in the title always being visible.

## Return Value

Returns [doc://com.apple.mapkit/documentation/MapKit/MapContent] whose titles have the visibility setting you specified.

## Supplying annotation titles

- **annotationSubtitles(_:)**: Sets the visibility of subtitles for markers and annotations.
